item.title: Meeting Notes
item.description: Context As no formal minutes were recorded, the following is a summation of notes as remembered by the author. Attendance Sponsors Anna Seat Aaron Smith Officers Aaron “Radar” Bishop - President Matthew Jordan - Vice President Kaeli “Sushi” Maxwell - Treasurer Reason: Work Ryland Asher - Secretary Reason: No longer a member True Williams - Grievance Officer Reason: No longer a member Goldie Snow - Historian Attendees Kayla Ford Karley Jones Reason: Prior obligations Ethan King Danica Rowe Reason: Prior obligations Ariana Snell Sadie Stone-McCarty Call To Order Time: 12:39 PM
